title: National protocol for COVID-19 vaccine (adults)
description: Protocol for the administration of COVID-19 vaccine to individuals aged 18 years and over in accordance with the national COVID-19 vaccination programme.
cleaned_text: National protocol for COVID-19 vaccine (adults) Protocol for the administration of COVID-19 vaccine to individuals aged 18 years and over in accordance with the national COVID-19 vaccination programme. Applies to England Documents Details This protocol is for the administration of COVID-19 vaccine to individuals aged 18 years and over in accordance with the national [COVID-19 vaccination programme](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/covid-19-vaccination-programme) by appropriately trained persons. National protocol for COVID-19 vaccine (adults) version 02.00 is valid from 7 September 2023 to 1 April 2024. The corresponding [COVID-19 PGD for use in adults](https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/covid-19-vaccination-programme/legal-mechanisms/patient-group-directions-pgds-for-covid-19-vaccines/) is available from NHS England.
